text:
@AOC Here again, @AOC exploits ‘inequality’ as an all-purpose piñata causing all the world’s ills, & parrots environmentalist claims that #coronavirus is due to capitalist production/progress. Instead, read Equal is Unfair by @yaronbrook & Don Watkins: https://t.co/f1hjpfpV7x
#COVID19
